name: Hive Mind (itch) (f0kes)
description:
Hive-Mind is retro stylized rogue-like.

 Save prisoners from dungeon and swap minds with them. Be a one man army.

ROOM TYPES:

Battle - get random enemies, higher level - more enemies. You can't leave until you kill them all!

Fountain - Heal to max and ressurect all members of your party. Can only use once per level!

Prison(looks like a box lol) - Get random new party member

Ladder - go to next level
